pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:0.5: 38. The training rule on outside their own country
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.2: At that time the nuns went wandering without a group of travelers where it was considered risky and dangerous outside their own country.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.4: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.5: “How can nuns go wandering without a group of travelers where it’s considered risky and dangerous outside their own country?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.6: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.11: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:1.12.1: ‘If a nun goes wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered risky and dangerous outside her own country, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.6: in any country apart from the one where she is living.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.8: a place has been seen along that road where criminals are camped, eating, standing, sitting, or lying down.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.10: criminals have been seen along that road, injuring, robbing, or beating people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.12: in the absence of a group of travelers.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.14: when the villages are a chicken’s flight apart, then for every next village she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.15: When it is an uninhabited area, a wilderness, then for every six kilometers she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.17: if she travels with a group;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.18: if she travels where it is safe and free from danger;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.21: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc38:2.22: The eighth training rule is finished.
